Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Establish and/or build the capacity of new/existing producer organizations.
Provide financing for subprojects under productive alliances.

Guidance for increased animal health sustainability

P3.P4.P6. The opportunity should be taken to raise awareness among producer organizations about food safety, AW, AMR issues related to livestock systems.
P2.P7. Training on developing animal diseases management plans should be provided to producers and producer organizations.
P3.P4.P5.P7. Include One Health criteria in project selection.
